Summary: My friends and I saw a Pulsating object flashing red, green, and white dance around in the sky doing zig zags and loops, but also staying put in one spot from time to time
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Ojai
There were no other sightings in Ojai on or around July 25th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsLast night my friends and I decided to go to the hot springs in Ojai, and after about an hour of star gazing an object caught my eye. Off in the distance over santa barbara a pulsating light was flashing red, green, and white. At first I thought it was a airplane, but I quickly realized it was dancing around in an erratic manner yet staying in the same relative area in the sky. zig zags, circles, and different light variations made me and my friends positive it was not an airplane or helicopter. As creepy as it was I could not look away, so I continued to stare at it for the next 30 minutes, watching it dance and slowly get smaller. The object slowly moved lower on the horizon until it slipped behind some trees.
